diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@    community:
        description:
            - The SNMP community string, required if version is v2/v2c.
        type: str
    level:

comments.body: This looks like more than a docs change.

Correct, it is a cleanup. The defaults for this string was the boolean value False, which isn't a string. So we fall back to the default None, which is the same as unset.

That's the only way to correctly fix the validate-modules issue.
